Alan Dean schrieb:
> 
> 
> With all of the discussions about the handling of ETags, If-Match, etc
> I thought that I would put up the flowchart we are using to define our
> test cases.
> 
> See http://www.flickr. com/photos/ alan-dean/ 367132415/ 
> <http://www.flickr.com/photos/alan-dean/367132415/>
> 
> If you notice any errors or misunderstanding of the HTTP spec in the
> diagram, please let me know :-)
> 
> Regards,
> Alan Dean

I think one thing that is missing is a more generic handling of method 
names (you may have that somewhere else in your code, but it's missing 
from the diagram).

For instance, MKCOL to an unmapped URI should either succeed (201) or 
fail with 405 (method not allowed).

Best regards, Julian
